name: Mental Fortress Tactics
description: Advanced cognitive training to create an unbreakable mental barrier against psychological attacks.

cards.title: Emotional Firewall Activation
cards.description: Installing subconscious mental barriers against external influence.
bulletpoints: Developing automatic cognitive shields against toxic interactions.
Practicing instant detachment when psychological attacks are detected.
Creating internal scripts to override external emotional manipulation.
cards.summaryText: Automate shields, detach on impact, and run inner scripts that nullify outside pushes.

cards.title: Cognitive Shock Absorption
cards.description: Training your mind to withstand and neutralize verbal and psychological attacks.
bulletpoints: Practicing delayed responses to weaken manipulative aggression.
Neutralizing provocations through controlled silence and non-reactivity.
Redirecting cognitive dissonance effects back onto the manipulator.
cards.summaryText: Slow your replies, stay silent, and bounce their cognitive shocks straight back.

cards.title: Mental Pattern Breakers
cards.description: Short-circuiting psychological control mechanisms before they take hold.
bulletpoints: Using humor and absurdity to deflate manipulative authority.
Injecting unpredictable responses to disrupt psychological conditioning attempts.
Practicing verbal judo techniques to disarm and deflect control attempts.
cards.summaryText: Throw humor, flip scripts unpredictably, and judo every control move off balance.
